column4: i seriously cannot believe how you can make such a nice OS, and yet giving people anything non-standard seems to require a membership to the secret inner sanctum of somthing
- i was trying to find the alternate ubuntu cd, which seems to have absolutly no reference off the main page, in the end i found out the filename and tried mirrors till i could download the file
Oh, yeah. It took me a while to track it down at first too. You did find a link for it right?
